explains: n. 实习生；实习期；实习医师的职位
wordGroup: internship programs 实习计划；实习课程

sentences.en: Her internship was cut short because of a technical snafu.
sentences.cn: 因为技术事故，她的实习期缩短了。

sentences.en: I wanted to ask about getting credits for the internship.
sentences.cn: 我想问一下关于获得实习学分的事。

sentences.en: Did the university give approval for you to earn four credits for this internship?
sentences.cn: 学校批准你这次实习可以得四个学分了吗？
